description:
Fiore is a very powerful jewel summoner who is Joshua`s caretaker/maid (whom he refers to as "older sister"). When she was younger she was taken by Aion. [Spoiler]Aion replaced her memories of Satella with memories of Joshua, which in turns makes her think that Joshua is her brother. She is completely devoted to Aion and Joshua, vowing to always protect Joshua no matter what. Later when she encountered her sister Satella she had no idea who she was.[/Spoiler]
(Wikipedia)
name: Florette Harvenheit
